name: UNANSWERED - Final Release
description:
NOTE: THIS GAME WAS DESIGNED FOR 1920x1080p DISPLAY- I apologise but it may not work properly on a different aspect ratio/smaller screen. (One small workaround is that you can use the "load level" function to skip past the intro cutscene- but you will likely still be unable to view important UI properly)

This is the final release of my 2D atmospheric puzzle platformer/adventure game- largely inspired by great games like LIMBO and INSIDE. 

There are now 6 stages to play through, 2 alternate endings, some creepy creatures, some epic puzzles, a functional flashlight with a battery, tons of responsive audio, an improved movement system, polished art/level design, and much more!

There is also now a level select screen, in case you want to resume from a certain point in the game (e.g. if you get stuck because of a bug and want to reset to try again, or if you are resuming from a previous play session!)

Note: any exit/quit to desktop options will just crash the game, and you'll have to reload the page to try again!

Would really appreciate feedback once you've given it a  go! https://forms.gle/BcrZR1zNdStWG2q57

Hope you enjoy :D

by Ethan Davidson
